mapper.sql: when "en" then (select post_name_en from sys_post where post_id = p.post_id) when "zh" then (select post_name from sys_post where post_id = p.post_id) when "id" then (select post_name_id from sys_post where post_id = p.post_id) end as post_name
select post_id, post_code, , post_sort, status, create_by, create_time, remark from sys_post p

where.if: AND post_name_en like concat('%', #{p.postName}, '%') OR post_name like concat('%', #{p.postName}, '%') OR post_name_id like concat('%', #{p.postName}, '%')

mapper.select: select p.post_id from sys_post p left join sys_user_post up on up.post_id = p.post_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = up.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
select p.post_id, , p.post_code from sys_post p left join sys_user_post up on up.post_id = p.post_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = up.user_id where u.user_name = #{userName}

select post_id, post_code, post_name, post_name_en, post_name_id, post_sort, status, create_by, create_time, remark from sys_post p where post_name=#{postName} or post_name_en=#{postName} or post_name_id=#{postName} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_post( post_id, post_code, post_name, post_name_en, post_name_id, post_sort, status, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{postId}, #{postCode}, #{postName}, #{postNameEn}, #{postNameId}, #{postSort}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
